statements: DELETE FROM SmartRefrigeratorUsagePatterns WHERE temperature_setting > 5 AND humidity_setting < 70
DELETE FROM SmartRefrigeratorUsagePatterns WHERE user_id = 123 AND temperature_setting = 5
DELETE FROM recommended_settings WHERE user_id = 1 AND recommended_energy_saving = TRUE;
DELETE FROM usage_data WHERE user_id = 'e132867c-6e23-4c5a-9579-e9dc90566993' AND usage_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM fridge_inventory WHERE fridge_id = 'c7d74878-bd2d-4cd1-bd2f-6b94b3d0a0e3' AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM refrigerator_settings WHERE current_temperature < 5 OR current_humidity > 80;
